data.name: Aim Lab Signature Series - Mongraal
data.detailed_description:
Loadout with the Mongraal x Aim Lab signature series pack and step into the shoes of a Fortnite champion with the Mongraal player avatar, along with adding two of his branded weapon skins for the M1 Garand & Spas12 to your Fortnite training arsenal.

Had a good training run? Share your best runs using the Mongraal skins with us on social for a chance of a shout out from @mongraal and @aimlab!

DLC includes:
  • Mongraal Player Avatar
  • Mongraal SPAS 12 Weapon Skin
  • Mongraal M1 Garand Weapon Skin

About Mongraal
Kyle Jackson is a professional eSports player who mainly plays Fortnite and is a member of the FaZe Clan.

data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, French, German, Bulgarian, Danish, Finnish, Hungarian, Korean, Polish, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 and up
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 and up
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
